page.title: 20THE DOMESDAY SURVEY
page.content: To begin, our teacher, Mr. Gunn, explained what we would be doing, then we got into the mini-bus. There were 13 pupils from my class and 2 teachers-Mr. Gunn and Mr. Jacobson. When we got to the right place we were given count-sheets and split into groups. My group had to count all the recreation facilities like parks and sports grounds. We used a photo-copied map and walked around the area we were surveying; two of us looked for the things we wanted to count and the other one wrote down what we saw. At the end of this all the groups came back and we returned to school. In the class we entered the numbers onto a master sheet. Another class will use these numbers to enter them onto the computer, then everything will be sent away to the BBC.
